text: In April of that year his first wife's brother-in-law, the diplomatist Lord Ponsonby, had written to advise Anglesey to give the system a trial, adding that it was being treated under a doctor who had studied under its founder, the aged Dr. Samuel. Hahnemann.
handwritten_text: 'moy-uY-mypY v?m tuyY mh ry F qdO n7 dipomainl Yord Ponronby, hud wrlaen to adire Anqurey Ao qiue the syptem a And,adding Jhal ws beig cwhiotd wih oxtacrdinay Auccon in Trance and lhdy,and Ahat Je Xumll wos ling Acatd under a dodor who hod sudied wder in tounder Ah aged Dr SamuelRahnomann.
name: Anglesey
